trichdan: Sofia Villani Scicolone Dame Grand Cross OMRI known professionally as Sophia Loren is an Italian actress. She was named by the American Film Institute as ...
noidung: Sofia Villani Scicolone Dame Grand Cross OMRI (Italian: [soˈfiːa vilˈlaːni ʃʃikoˈloːne]; born 20 September 1934), known professionally as Sophia Loren (/ləˈrɛn/;[2] Italian: [ˈlɔːren]) is an Italian actress. She was named by the American Film Institute as the 21st greatest female star of Classic Hollywood Cinema.[3] She is currently the only living actress and highest ranked living person mentioned on the list.
